show_name: How Heavy Are the Dumbbells You Lift? (TV)
other_title: How much heavy dumbbells can you lift?
ダンベル何キロ持てる？ (Japanese)
plot: When a friend cruelly calls Hibiki fat it's like a knife stabbed into her heart. The high school girl loves to eat but decides to go on a diet to be absolutely thin by summer vacation, but she doesn't know how to exercise properly on her own. Hibiki finds herself in front of a training gym and joins. Once there, she meets her beautiful and charismatic student council president Akemi Sōryūin and steps into the intense yet enjoyable world of weight-training. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Onegai Muscle" (お願いマッスル) by Ai Fairouz & Kaito Ishikawa
ending_theme: "Macho Anemu?" (マッチョアネーム？) by Kaito Ishikawa
